robot

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommListener

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommListener
    Main controller of the NXT brick, it will take in the message sent by the PC via bluetooth, put it in queue, pop it and execute it Listener template from professor Glassy
